record.dc:title: 357AN17 Lea Farm, Anderson County, Tennessee. Burial 1. Village site. Burial inside Feature 12 in Trench 6. Direction East.
record.wpa:narrative: [Feature 12] Rectangular outline of structure containing burial of an adult on floor, no artifacts with burial. Skeleton tightly flexed, lying on left side, head to west. [Burial 1] Adult male in fair condition, lying on left side, tightly flexed, arms up towards chin, head to west. Oval Shaped Grave. Effigy pipe found in Trench 6 near burial, 34" east of Burial 1. Burial made inside of Feature 12 (structure), lying on the structure floor.
